muslim ratawal bahutharayak shri lankawata pakshawa chandaya laba dunha.amerika eksath janapada yojanawa wadi chanda 12 kin sammatha wu athara eeta pakshawa ratawal 25 k chandaya labadun bawada eeta amatharawa shri lankawe wathman sanwardhana kriyadamaya saha prathisandhana kriyawaliya agayamin lowa ratawal 13 k adala yojanawata wiruddhawa chandaya pawichchi kala bawa da jiniwahi shri lanka nithya niyojitha karyalaya pawasayi.me athara japanaya athuluwa ratawal 8 k me yojanawa sandaha chandaya dimen walaki sitiyaha.shri lankawe manawa himikam thaththwaya, prathisandhanaya menma punaruththapanaya aadi karunu rasak athulath karamin amerika eksath janapadaya wisin jagath manawa himikam kawunsalaya hamuwata idiripath kalayojanawa sandaha shri lankawata hithawath ratawal rasak wirodhaya palakala athara koti hithawadi indiyawa athulu ratawal 25 k ema yojanawa sammatha karamin koti kriyakarakam sandaha yalith warak sahayogaya labadi thibe.me athara shri lankawe siduwi yayi kiyana yuda aparadha soya balimata eksath jathinge sanwidhanaye niyojithayanata shri lankawata paminimata awasthawa salasana lesa ema yojanawen illimak kara thibena athara ”shri lankawe sanhindiyawa ha wagawime ka්riyawaliya pa්rawardhanaya” yana mayen ema yojanawaliya idiripath kala bawada jiniwahi shri lanka nithya niyojitha karyalaya sadahan karayi.shri lankawe wathman prathisandhanaya saha sanwardhana kriyawaliya sandaha lak rajaya gena thibena wadapiliwela agaya karamin ratawal 13 k shri lankawa wenuwen jagath manawa himikam kawunsalaye peni siti athara ehidi owun amerikanu yojanawata erehiwa chandaya pawichchi kala bawada kongo, ikwadoraya, indunisiyawa, kuwet, maladiwayina, moriteniya, pakisthanaya, pilipinaya, katar, thayilanthaya, ugandawa, eksath arabi emir rajyaya saha wenisiyulawa ema ratawal wana bawada widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya pawasayi.me athara koti hithawadinge kriyakarakam agaya karamin saha thama deshapalana aramunu itukara ganime apekshawen amerikawa idiripathkala yojanawa sandaha koti hithawadi indiyawa athuluwa ratawal 25 k chandaya labadi thibena athara aarjantinawa, oostriyawa, benin rajyaya, brasilaya, chili, kostarika, ayiwarikost, chek janarajaya, bestoniya, jarman, gothamalawa, ayarlanthaya, ithaliya, libiyawa, montinigro, peru, polanthaya, koriyawa, moldowa, rumeniyawa, siyaraliyon, spagnynyaya, switsarlanthaya, amerikawa ee athara weyi.
